Additional Scope Comments: Non-capstone accounts will be managed according to disposition instructions outlined in GRS6.1 item 011. Emails will be destroyed within the USADF electronic recording-keeping system at the appropriate time.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff will be the end of the employee's tenure.
Transfer Instructions: Agency's Capstone designated employees' emails will be transferred to NARA when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: USADF will include legacy emails dating back to 2013.

Agency Records Officer: Mark Anthony Hampton, Records Management Specialist

Additional Scope Comments: All Forest Service email in all agency email accounts will be managed using GRS 6.1 items 010 and 011.  The agency will not be using item 012.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be annual.
Legacy Email Scope: The Capstone approach will be applied to legacy email starting in 2011 when USDA and its components implemented ProofPoint. Prior to 2011, USDA applied a print and file policy to email. Extant legacy email prior to 2011 is inaccessible and will be scheduled for disposal on a separate Request for Disposition Authority.
